title: FAQ Best Selling Fonts
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Type Business Section](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Business%20Section) : Best Selling Fonts**

Many [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) and [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) maintain best seller lists on their websites. These are not to be confused with independent, non-foundry lists, like those found on [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographica).

_Here are some links:_

[FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) International  
 [Ten typefaces of 2007](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/jan08a/)

[FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) Germany  
 [http://www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?ch=%2Fprodtips.php3%3Fns%3D10%26sns%3D1...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?ch=%2Fprodtips.php3%3Fns%3D10%26sns%3D1%3Cbr%20/%3E "http://www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?ch=%2Fprodtips.php3%3Fns%3D10%26sns%3D1%3Cbr%20/%3E")

[Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype)  
 [Font Charts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.linotype.com/8-37-8/fontcharts.html)  
and  
 [Favorite Fonts 2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.linotype.com/8-2628-8/favouritefonts2005.html)

[Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype)  
 [Top 10 Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/Top10.htm)

[MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MyFonts)  
 [Top 50 Best Sellers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.myfonts.com/bestsellers.html)

[Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer)  
 [Top 10 Type Stories of 2007](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.veer.com/hear/archive/email.071204.html)  
 [Top 10 Type Stories of 2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.veer.com/hear/archive/email.061205.html)  
 [Top Typefaces of 2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/www.veer.com/products/gallery.aspx?gallery=264)

**Discussion:**  
 [Veer's Top 18 of 2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/node/17413)  
 [Phil's Fonts Top 25 of 2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/node/30521)  
 [Best fonts of 2006 for MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921091915/http:/typophile.com/node/30700)
author: Ale Paul
